content: your heel flap a bit longer heel flap worked over half the stitches over 32 stitches knit in heel stitch left for 32 rw 1 *sl 1 purlwise k1 repeat from * to end rw 2 sl 1 purlwise p to end row 16 slipped stitches repeat row 1 and 2 until a the heel flap is square usually you will knit the same number of row as stitches you are working the flap over or b the heel flap just reaches the back of your heel when the sock is stretched comfortably on your foot heel turn rw 1 sl 1 k18 ssk k1 turn rw 1 sl 1 knit until you are three stitches past rw 2 sl 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn 10 st remain the center point ssk k1 turn count the unworked on each side of flap after the gap stitches you left unworked when you turned rw 3 sl 1 k8 ssk across the gap k1 turn this number is n rw 4 sl 1 p9 p2tog across the gap p1 turn rw 2 sl 1 purl until the number of stitches rw 5 sl 1 k10 ssk across the gap k1 turn remaining is n plus three p2tog p1 turn rw 6 sl 1 p11 p2tog across the gap p1 turn the same number of stitches should remain rw 7 sl 1 k12 ssk across the gap k1 turn unworked on each side of flap after the gap rw 8 sl 1 p13 p2tog across the gap p1 turn rw 3 sl 1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk rw 9 sl 1 k14 ssk across the gap k1 turn across the gap k1 turn rw 10 sl 1 p15 p2tog across the gap p1 turn rw 4 sl 1 purl to one stitch before the gap rw 11 sl 1 k16 ssk across the gap k1 turn p2tog across the gap p1 turn rw 12 sl 1 p17 p2tog across the gap p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until no stitches remain 20 stitches remain on the heel needle unworked gusset knit across 10 heel stitches and arrange needles knit across half the heel stitches and arrange so this is the bor needles so this is the beginning of the round knit the remaining 10 heel stitches pick up and knit one stitch for every two row pick up 16 stitches down the heel flap down the side of the heel flap pick up 2 stitches in the gusset pick up two extra stitches in the gusset to prevent place marker holes knit across instep place marker place marker knit across the instep pick up 2 stitches in the gusset place marker pick up 16 stitches up the heel flap pick up two stitches in the gusset and then one knit to end of round stitch for every two row up the other side of 88 stitches total the heel flap you are working in the round again round
